education.summary:
This nanodegree course extensively taught various technical skills needed to build database-backed APIs and web applications including:

	• SQL and Data Modelling for the Web
	• API Development and Documentation
	• Identity and Access Management
	• Server Deployment, Containerization and Testing

Find the full syllabus here: https://www.udacity.com/course/full-stack-web-developer-nanodegree--nd0044

This course taught comprehensively various technical skills important in frontend web development. Completed several projects encompassing the knowledge of:

	• HTML, CSS and JavaScript
	• Responsive Web Design
	• Object-Oriented Programming
	• Web Accessibility
	• Test-driven development
	• Working with APIs
	• Working with several frameworks (among others)

• Graduated with First Class Honours. 

• Relevant Coursework: Software Engineering Fundamentals, Computer Programming, Computer Architecture, Algorithms and Data Structures, Systems Programming, Machine and Assembly Language Programming, Digital Electronics, Digital Computer Design, Microprocessors & Microcomputers, Database Management, Computer Networks, Information Theory & Coding, Numerical Methods in Engineering, Technical Communication.

work.summary:
• Currently working with the Eyowo team to build out web interfaces that help users interact with the product - which provides financial services to anyone with a phone number. 
• Worked on front-end applications to drive NPower - a Nigerian Federal Government programme that addresses the problem of youth unemployment in the country - alongside other disciplines including testing, design, and UI developers.

• Architecting and developing fully functional, accessible and responsive web applications using a wide range of tools and technologies for various clients. 
• Services provided for these clients span across front-end development to full-stack application development. Checkout my portfolio to see some of these applications live.

• Worked with the software team to build software to support the company's hardware products. 
• Designed, developed and maintained the front-end application for the company's project using ReactJS, TypeScript and Material UI. 
• Developed web services for user and order management using Flask.

work.company: Eko Konnect Research and Education Initiative
work.summary: • Worked primarily with Linux (UBUNTU) as an operating system, learning about and unlocking its benefits and applications in everyday development.
